response.overview: In a performative intervention on the Czech Television show Artóza, Ondřej Brody drew attention to the problematic nature of art evaluation—and this was more than a decade before the art community began to address this topic in connection with the awarding of prizes. Brody was invited to the show by one of the jurors, Michal Pěchouček, who—along with the other jurors, historian and curator Vlasta Čiháková Noshiro and performer Jiří Surůvka—was confronted by a quite immediate physical manifestation instead of an attempt at self-presentation.
response.title: Artstar
